short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you manipulate the DOM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A prototype for an ethicalCompass, aiding ethical shopping habits.
When turned on it highlights any items displayed that are not compliant with vetted ethical standards registers.
